name: Rick&Morty Platformer
description:
RICK & MORTY

Rick & Morty is a platform-action video game that derives from a Youtube promo video done by Paul Roberton, since so many Rick & Morty fans request the game to be made, I can't stand by seeing how frustrated the fans are, so I decided to make this game! If Paul is willing to work with me and we get some funding from adult swim maybe we could expand it to a full game! 

Click on the download now button - 
click on: No thanks, just take me to the downloads
It's free you do not have to pay any money!
